channel.title: [req]CS4 thing[req]
channel.description:
I just have a quick request, very simple. Similar to the Iphone reflective thing, could I have one with the words "studio 17" Black background, words slighting reflecting, and have the words studio in white, and 17 in some kinda glowing rainbow. Full screen size please, possibly 1080x1200 (or whatever it is) Words centered, decent amount of black in background, but words not 2 small
I would do it, but I'm very busy with school stuff You'll get credits in everything I use it in, like my youtube channel.
